alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 9:44AM CDT until March 31 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Embarras River at Lawrenceville affecting Lawrence County. .The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING TO FRIDAY, MARCH 31... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Embarras River at Lawrenceville. * WHEN...From Friday evening to Friday, March 31. * IMPACTS...At 36.0 feet, Billet-Vincennes River road is inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 20.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening to a crest of 36.0 feet Saturday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Friday, March 31. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Embarras River Lawrenceville 30.0 20.0 Thu 8 am CDT 25.0 34.9 35.9 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to prepare for flooding. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation.
